name: web_pdf
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool pragmavantapi.
Tool description: Practical API for streamlined business and cloud applications.
API description: Takes a webpage URL and returns a snapshot based on the specified accept headers.

accept.description: The format in which the snapshot is to be returned (e.g., image/png, application/pdf).

source.description: The URL of the webpage to snapshot.
